name: Krampus Night
description:
A very short game jam made in less than 6 hours for the Winter Retro Game Jam as part of the Sacramento Game Development Collective. Run from Krampus in this extremely fast and cruel runner. Steal the present. Or don't!

This is an extremely rough prototype in Unity3D, made partially with pre-existing assets from Unity. It starts immediately on load.

Controls:

A,D to move. Space to jump. Esc to quit.

Made by:

Nathan Allshouse, Jim Niehues. Justin Osterholt, Al Bueche, Garret McPherson, and David Newel
